summary: This is a calendar entry for the video arraignment and bail hearing of Ghislaine Maxwell, scheduled for July 14, 2020, in the U.S. District Court for the Southern District of New York. It indicates the event was organized by the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The subject of the scheduled arraignment and bail hearing. The event is named 'Maxwell Arraignment and Bail Hearing'.

events.title: Maxwell Video Arraignment and Bail Hearing
events.description: A scheduled court proceeding for the arraignment and bail hearing of Ghislaine Maxwell, conducted by video.

locations: U.S. District Court for the Southern District of New York
keyFacts: Ghislaine Maxwell's arraignment and bail hearing was scheduled for July 14, 2020.
The hearing was planned to be conducted by video.
The event was organized by the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York (USANYS).
